Description: Sycomore fig wood mummy-label of Apa Nishterow.
Curator's comments: Check inscription. Cf. Coptic mummy label Delattre in CdE 80 (2005): 373-74; and (Christian) Greek mummy label, Henner, et al 1999, no. 47 (pp.57-58). see Hall, H.R. 1950. Greek mummy-labels in the British Museum. Proceedings of the Society of Biblical Archaeology 27 p. 48 nr. 1.
Bibliographic references: Muhs 2012 / Robert Curzon and his mummy labels (p. 291)
Acquisition name: Transferred from: British Library (Department of Manuscripts)
Previous owner: Previous owner/ex-collection: Darea Curzon, 16th Baroness Zouche
Previous owner/ex-collection: Robin Curzon, 15th Baron Zouche
Previous owner/ex-collection: Robert Curzon, 14th Baron Zouche
Acquisition notes: EA 66416, EA 66417, EA 66418, EA 66419, EA 66420 purchased by Robert Curzon at Abydos in 9-15 February 1838 (see Muhs and Vorderstrasse, JEA 2008). In 1876, Robert Curzon's collection was placed on deposit in Department of Manuscripts by his son Robin Curzon. Upon her death in 1917, his sister, Darea Curzon, bequeathed the collection the to the British Museum.
